department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography:
Pradeep Nayar is currently the User Experience Director at Allstate Insurance Company where he leads human-centered projects to drive engagement, innovation and adoption. Prior to joining Allstate he has worked several UX leadership roles in the e-commerce and media industry.

Pradeep has more than 14 years of experience in Information Technology that includes roles in software development, systems support, solution architecture and user experience. He likes understanding customer problems and solving them by utilizing technology in creative ways.

Pradeep holds a Bachelors of Engineering degree in Computer Science & Engineering, a Master’s Degree in Computer Science from Illinois Institute of Technology and a Master’s Degree in Human-Computer Interaction from DePaul University. His current area of interest is UX Strategy, multi-channel experiences and the intersection of user experience, development and business practices.

Pradeep unfortunately doesn’t stop thinking about design. Whether it’s people, process, products, services or experiences, he does stop asking why. His constant obsession with good design find him staring at poorly designed soap dispenser in an airport bathroom.

Specialties: User Experience, Experience Strategy, Design Thinking, Interaction Design, Information Architecture, Innovation, Product Design
